member.name: WINHTTP_CURRENT_USER_IE_PROXY_CONFIG
member.summary: The WINHTTP_CURRENT_USER_IE_PROXY_CONFIG structure contains the Internet Explorer proxy configuration information.

member.name: WINHTTP_CURRENT_USER_IE_PROXY_CONFIG.fAutoDetect
member.summary: If TRUE, indicates that the Internet Explorer proxy configuration for the current user specifies "automatically detect settings".

member.name: WINHTTP_CURRENT_USER_IE_PROXY_CONFIG.lpszAutoConfigUrl
member.summary: Pointer to a null-terminated Unicode string that contains the auto-configuration URL if the Internet Explorer proxy configuration for the current user specifies "Use automatic proxy configuration".

member.name: WINHTTP_CURRENT_USER_IE_PROXY_CONFIG.lpszProxy
member.summary: Pointer to a null-terminated Unicode string that contains the proxy URL if the Internet Explorer proxy configuration for the current user specifies "use a proxy server".

member.name: WINHTTP_CURRENT_USER_IE_PROXY_CONFIG.lpszProxyBypass
member.summary: Pointer to a null-terminated Unicode string that contains the optional proxy by-pass server list.
